channel.title: Need help finishing my dueling
channel.description:
this is the code i have for no armor
[code]if((slot == playerHat || slot == playerCape || slot == playerChest || slot == playerLegs || slot == playerShield || slot == playerFeet) && duelRule[5]) { sendMessage("Armour is disabled in this duel!");[/code]
when you click an item it gives the message but still wields it. Can anyone suggest anything?
